Package src

Class Player

java.lang.Object
src.Participant
src.Player
public class Player extends Participant
Represents a human player in the Blackjack game. Manages the player's money, current bet, and decision-making during their turn.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int startingMoney, Scanner scanner)
      Constructs a Player with the specified starting money and Scanner.
      Parameters:
      startingMoney - The initial amount of money the player has.
      scanner - The Scanner object for user input.

  • Method Details

    • getMoney

      public int getMoney()
      Retrieves the current amount of money the player has.
      Returns:
      The player's current money.

    • placeBet

      public void placeBet(int betAmount)
      Places a bet for the current round. Adjusts the bet if it exceeds the player's available money.
      Parameters:
      betAmount - The amount the player wishes to bet.

    • getCurrentBet

      public int getCurrentBet()
      Retrieves the current bet amount.
      Returns:
      The current bet.

    • addWinnings

      public void addWinnings(int amount)
      Adds winnings to the player's money.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount won.

    • decideHitOrStay

      public String decideHitOrStay()
      Prompts the player to decide whether to hit or stay. Continues to prompt until a valid input ('h' or 's') is received.
      Returns:
      The player's decision: "h" for hit or "s" for stay.

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn(Deck deck)
      Executes the player's turn, allowing them to hit or stay until they choose to stay or bust.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Participant
      Parameters:
      deck - The Deck from which to draw cards.
